result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawnah M Degunion

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

ADDRESS INFO for Shawnah M Degunion
Current: 602 Prospect Ave, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 05-02-2017)
Prior: 7801 88th Avenue, Lot 1, Pleasant Prairie, WI 53158 United States

Case called: 11:43 am
Includes 15CM249 and 15CM645.
Clerk: Kassidi
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in person pro se;
Parties have come to an agreement and would like to proceed with a plea/sentencing today. All future dates off. 

VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves: 
15CM249:
Ct. 1 (DC)>>DRI

15CM645:
Ct. 1 (BJ)>>DRI
Ct. 2 dismiss the Domestic Abuse Enhancer.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: Ct. 2 (DC)>>GUILTY. 

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/H- 1 year probation. CONDITIONS: Attend Women's Issue Class, counseling as recommended, No Contact with R.M, Court Costs. 

Adjourned: 11:50 am

Case Called: 11:26 am
Includes 15CM249 and 15CM645.
Clerk: Kassidi
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence; Deft appears pro se.
State provided an Amended Offer that included both cases.
Defendant states that she wishes to proceed to Trial.
COURT addresses defendant regarding status of counsel and wants a status conference before the trial.
Jury instructions 3 business days before the Trial. 
Adj: 11:30 am

DATES: CC for 5/17/15 to set scheduling conference.
Court dates to remain on Court calendar at this time.

Pre-trial conference on March 16, 2015 at 03:20 pm.
Final pre-trial on April 16, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Jury Trial on May 21, 2015 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Shawnah M Degunion
Current: 7801 88th Avenue, Lot 1, Pleasant Prairie, WI 53158 United States  (Effective: 02-19-2015)

Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.    Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.
